help.title: Help
help.subtitle: How can we help you?
help.description: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions or contact our support team.

items.q: How can I create an account?
items.a: Click on 'Login' and select 'Create new account'. Enter your details and confirm your email to activate your account.

items.q: I forgot my password, how do I recover it?
items.a: On the login page, click 'Forgot your password?', enter your email and follow the instructions sent to you.

items.q: How do I change my email or personal data?
items.a: Go to your profile and select 'Edit data'. Save the changes to update your account.

items.q: Can I change the platform language?
items.a: Yes, use the language selector at the top right. Your preference will be saved for future visits.
You can write to soporte@vivesano.com, use the contact form or the help chat available on the website.

items.q: What benefits do I get from using ViveSano?
items.a: You improve your physical and mental health, earn rewards and access exclusive content about healthy habits.

items.q: Is ViveSano free or does it have a cost?
items.a: You can register and use most features for free. Some premium features may require a subscription.
You earn points, achievements and badges by completing healthy habits and challenges. You can level up and unlock rewards.

items.q: Can I use ViveSano on my mobile?
items.a: Yes, the website is responsive and you can access it from any mobile device or tablet.

items.q: How do I log my habits or activities?
items.a: From your main dashboard, select the habit you want to log and mark it as completed. You can add new habits from the corresponding section.

items.q: What if I don't receive the confirmation email?
items.a: Check your spam or junk folder. If you can't find it, request a resend from the login page.

items.q: How can I suggest an improvement or report a bug?
items.a: In the contact section you can send your suggestions or report bugs to the team.
Yes, we comply with data protection regulations and your information is safe and encrypted.
Yes, you can request account deletion from your profile or by writing to soporte@vivesano.com.

items.q: What kind of challenges are available?
items.a: There are individual challenges focused on physical activity, nutrition, emotional well-being and more. You can join from the challenges section.

items.q: How does the points system work?
items.a: You earn points for every completed habit and challenge. Points help you level up and unlock rewards.

items.q: Can I connect with other users or is there a community?
items.a: Currently ViveSano does not have community features or user connections. All activities and achievements are personal.
